s.text: In an NYT op-ed, Erika Niedowski, a reporter for the inside-the-Beltway newsletter the Hill , points out that several lawmakers who sit on the Thompson fund-raising investigating committee have themselves paid stiff fines for violating state and federal election laws.
The paper points out that Clinton is trying to address the former problem by ensuring that a $4.
It's amazing to live in a world where that number doesn't make the front page.
One main reason for the softening, says the paper, is that Clinton doesn't want to appear to be pressuring Reno.
